USER PERSONA: Design Agency - United States

Table 01: DEMOGRAPHICS

| Data Points | Answers |
| --- | --- |
| Name | Olivia Smith |
| Age | 28 |
| Occupation | Marketing Manager |
| Annual Income | $75,000 |
| Marital Status | Single |
| Family Situation | No children |
| Location | Los Angeles, CA |

Table 02: USER DESCRIPTION

Olivia is a 28-year-old marketing manager based in Los Angeles, CA. She is responsible for overseeing all marketing initiatives for her company, including branding, social media, and website design. Olivia is detail-oriented and values creativity and innovation in design. She has a busy schedule and is always on the lookout for design solutions that can help her team work efficiently and effectively.

Table 03: PSYCHOGRAPHICS

| Data Points | Answers |
| --- | --- |
| Personal characteristics | Detail-oriented, innovative, creative, busy schedule |
| Hobbies | Reading, hiking, watching TV |
| Interests | Marketing, branding, graphic design |
| Personal aspirations | Advance in her career as a marketing professional |
| Professional goals | To increase brand awareness, improve customer engagement and generate leads through design |
| Pains | Tight deadlines, lack of design resources, high design costs |
| Main challenges | Keeping up with the latest design trends, managing multiple design projects simultaneously |
| Needs | High-quality design services that are affordable and efficient |
| Dreams | To see her company's brand become a leader in the industry through innovative design solutions |

Table 04: SHOPPING BEHAVIORS

| Data Points | Answers |
| --- | --- |
| Budget | $1,000 - $5,000 |
| Shopping frequency | Occasional |
| Preferred channels | Online, Referrals |
| Online behavior | Researches on social media and review sites before making a decision |
| Search terms | "Affordable design agency", "Creative design solutions" |
| Preferred brands | Local design agencies |
| Triggers | High-quality portfolio, affordable pricing, fast turnaround times |
| Barriers | Limited budget, lack of design expertise within the team |

To solve Olivia's pain points, our design agency could offer affordable design packages tailored to her needs, with transparent pricing and fast turnaround times. We could also offer design training and resources to help her improve her own design skills and manage multiple projects more efficiently. Additionally, we could offer flexible meeting times and communication channels to make the design process as seamless and stress-free as possible.

Cold Email Template:

Subject: Innovative design solutions for your marketing needs

Dear Olivia,

As a marketing manager, we understand that you have a lot on your plate, from overseeing branding and social media initiatives to managing multiple design projects simultaneously. That's why we want to offer you a stress-free solution to your design needs.

At [Your Design Agency], we specialize in logo design, UI/UX, business card design, social media content design, and copywriting. We pride ourselves on delivering high-quality design solutions at affordable prices and fast turnaround times.

We also offer design training and resources to help you improve your design skills and manage your design projects more efficiently. Our flexible meeting times and communication channels ensure that we can work around your busy schedule and provide you with the support you need.

We would love to discuss how we can help you achieve your marketing goals and take your brand to the next level. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us to learn more about our services.
